1.0.name: wordpress/daecolor
1.0.description: DaeColor the first category color coding plugin for wordpress by DaeVision inc.It's a simple plug-in that adds the category name and a colored block to your posts. You can either use the color picker to select the category color or use our color coding algorithm to automatically generate a unique color for each of your categories.Add a splash of color to your site!
